com.sun.enterprise.resource.allocator

Class AbstractConnectorAllocator

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.sun.enterprise.resource.allocator.AbstractConnectorAllocator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ResourceAllocator
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BasicResourceAllocator, ConnectorAllocator, LocalTxConnectorAllocator, NoTxConnectorAllocator

    public abstract class AbstractConnectorAllocator
extends Object
implements ResourceAllocator
    An abstract implementation of the ResourceAllocator interface that houses all the common implementation(s) of the various connector allocators. All resource allocators except BasicResourceAllocator extend this abstract implementation
    Author:
    Sivakumar Thyagarajan
